Text:
What's the probem with you, trolkan?

I upload torrents that are already here for two reasons:

1. I must include a portuguese subtitle;
2. I seed through a seedbox, so I have full control of the ratios.

As far I can see, you didn't upload a single torren to TPB, so why you have to be a prick?
Thanks very much, one of the best movies ever, subtle and harsh....
